Name: pandoc-svg
Author: @jeromerobert
Short Description: Pandoc filter to create PDF files from SVG
Caveats: The gist is unmantained but see the comments in it

Name: texsvg
Author: @lierdakil
Short Description: Pandoc filter to convert math to inline svg using latex and dvisvgm

Name: pandoc-include
Author: @steindani
Short Description: A Pandoc filter that replaces include labeled Code Blocks with the contents of the referenced files. Even nested, recursive includes.

Name: pandoc-csv2table
Author: @baig
Short Description: A Pandoc filter that renders CSV as Pandoc Markdown Tables.
Editor's Description: convert to pandoc's 4 markdown tables syntax

Name: pandoc-placetable
Author: @mb21
Short Description: Pandoc filter to include CSV data (from file or URL).

Name: latexdivs
Author: @ickc
Short Description: Pandoc filter to convert divs with latex="true" to LaTeX environments in LaTeX output. The first class will be regarded as the name of the latex environment.

Name: pandoc-amsthm
Author: @ickc
Short Description: provide a syntax to use amsthm environments in pandoc, with output in LaTeX and HTML

Name: pandoc-latex-environment
Author: @chdemko
Short Description: Pandoc filter for adding LaTeX environement on specific div

Name: pandoc-code2raw
Author: @bpj
Short Description: Pandoc filter to insert arbitrary raw output markup as Code/CodeBlocks with an attribute raw=<outputformat>.

Name: pandoc-filter-arrows
Author: @nichtich
Short Description: Replace ASCII arrows by LaTeX arrows

Name: multifilter
Author: @nichtich
Short Description: apply all filters listed in metadata field "multifilter"

Name: qids
Author: @nichtich
Short Description: link all Wikidata ids such as [Q123]
